summary:
An update to Team Mystery's Non-Essential Killable Children. Now compatible with Hearthfire.
Allows children to die as well as allowing them to be pickpocketed.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3]This is an updated version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13202]Team Mystery's Non-Essential Killable Children[/url].
All credit for the original mod goes to Team Mystery.[/size]
[line]
[size=3]I'll be working in conjunction with iyumichan to maintain this mod.[/size]
[size=5][i][color=yellow]Please download the most recent version from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13202]this site[/url].[/color][/i][/size]
[size=3]If you've already downloaded the mod, then you should go to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13202]this page[/url]
and make sure to track it for notification of future updates.
[color=yellow]This mod will not be continued on this page.[/color][/size][/center][line]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured_500.png[/img][/url][/center]
[b][size=4]Features:[/size][/b][list]
[*] Children can now die.
[*] Children can be pickpocketed and looted.
[*] Children only use furniture built for them (children chairs, beds, etc) and won't attempt to use furniture not made for them. (No stretching of children)
[*] Hearthfire items have been added to children inventories [i]HEARTHFIRE VERSION ONLY[/i]
[*] Children inventories have been adjusted to reflect their personalities and social rank. Poor children will have next to nothing, while children from wealthy families may have treats, toys, books, and other items. [i]HEARTHFIRE VERSION ONLY[/i]
[/list]
[b][size=4]Please Note:[/size][/b][list]
[*] Fjotra is essential until the quest "The Heart of Dibella" is either failed or completed.
[*] Aventus Aretino is essential until the quest "Innocence Lost" is completed.
[*] Nelkir is essential until the quest "The Whispering Door" is completed.
[*] Babette is essential until the quest "Death Incarnate" is completed.
[/list]

[b][size=4]About this Update:[/size][/b]
I've resolved the conflicts between the original mod and the Unofficial Skyrim Patch. Changes made by USKP have now been carried over into this mod, and the mod has been cleaned with TES5Edit. The changes to Babette have now been included in the mod. In addition, I created a Hearthfire version. The Hearthfire version changes the newly added children's furniture to work with this mod. It also makes a few tweaks to the children inventories and adds the chance of Hearthfire items appearing in their inventories.
author: Team Mystery and kryptopyr
